overview: Christmas Eve is approaching. The dwarfs go to their underground grotto for a winter sleep. One of them, named Podziomek, is wandering and cannot hit the house. During his journey, he meets fox Sade≈Ç, who asks him for a favor. The Podziom agrees to help him, not suspecting that the crafty fox has evil plans
title: O krasnalach i wigilii
